Styleguide

  • 1.0: Layout Elements
  • 2.0: Typography
  • 3.0: Media Elements
  • 4.0: Form Inputs

1.0.1 - Grid Row

A flow layout row

Default styling

 
<div class="grid-row"></div>

1.0.2 - Grid Cell

A flow layout cell

Default styling

 
<div class="grid-row"><div class="grid-cell"></div></div>

2.0.1 - First-level Headline

A standard first-level headline. The most important headline for a section. You should use this within an

tag.

Default styling

 
<div class="grid-row"></div>

3.0.1 - Image

A basic image.

Default styling

 
<img src="" alt="An image." />

4.0.1 - Text Input

A basic text input.

Default styling
:hover

Subtle hover highlight.
:focus

Subtle focus highlight and dark border.
.invalid

Invalid input detected.

 
<input type="text" class="{{modifier_class}}" />

4.0.2 - Email Input

An email-specific text input.

Default styling
:hover

Subtle hover highlight.
:focus

Subtle focus highlight and dark border.
.invalid

Invalid input detected.

 
<input type="email" class="{{modifier_class}}" />

4.0.3 - Search Input

A search-specific text input.

Default styling
:hover

Subtle hover highlight.
:focus

Subtle focus highlight and dark border.
.invalid

Invalid input detected.

 
<input type="search" class="{{modifier_class}}" />
